template.name: Docusign Document Signing
template.desc: v1.3 simple flow with single assignee. select docs via apidoc (tim's creds), fire up docusign for each document.

flow.name: document sign
flow.BPMNXML:
<definitions typeLanguage="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" expressionLanguage="http://www.w3.org/1999/XPath" targetNamespace="http://www.activiti.org/test" xmlns="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/MODEL" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:activiti="http://activiti.org/bpmn" xmlns:bpmndi="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/DI" xmlns:omgdc="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DC" xmlns:omgdi="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DI">
    <message id="injectListJSON" name="injectListJSON"/>
    <process id="document_sign" name="document sign" isExecutable="true">
        <startEvent id="start" name="document sign"/>
        <sequenceFlow id="flow8" sourceRef="start" targetRef="serviceTask1"/>
        <serviceTask id="serviceTask1" name="select document" activiti:class="plugins.facts">
            <extensionElements>
                <activiti:field name="PluginKey">
                    <activiti:string>poi_selectdocument_fact</activiti:string>
                </activiti:field>
                <activiti:field name="parameterMap">
                    <activiti:expression>${getMap}</activiti:expression>
                </activiti:field>
            </extensionElements>
        </serviceTask>
        <sequenceFlow id="flow9" sourceRef="serviceTask1" targetRef="userTask2"/>
        <userTask id="userTask2" name="enter" activiti:formKey="poi_enter_form" activiti:assignee="${wf_currentAssignee}"/>
        <boundaryEvent id="boundarymessage10" name="Message" cancelActivity="false" attachedToRef="userTask2">
            <messageEventDefinition messageRef="injectListJSON"/>
        </boundaryEvent>
        <sequenceFlow id="flow11" sourceRef="userTask2" targetRef="serviceTask3"/>
        <serviceTask id="serviceTask3" name="invoke docusign" activiti:class="plugins.facts">
            <extensionElements>
                <activiti:field name="PluginKey">
                    <activiti:string>poi_invokedocusign_fact</activiti:string>
                </activiti:field>
                <activiti:field name="parameterMap">
                    <activiti:expression>${get2Map}</activiti:expression>
                </activiti:field>
            </extensionElements>
        </serviceTask>
        <sequenceFlow id="flow12" sourceRef="serviceTask3" targetRef="userTask4"/>
        <userTask id="userTask4" name="sign or reject" activiti:formKey="poi_signorreject_form" activiti:assignee="${wf_currentAssignee}"/>
        <boundaryEvent id="boundarymessage13" name="Message" cancelActivity="false" attachedToRef="userTask4">
            <messageEventDefinition messageRef="injectListJSON"/>
        </boundaryEvent>
        <sequenceFlow id="flow14" sourceRef="userTask4" targetRef="end"/>
        <endEvent id="end" name="end"/>
    </process>
</definitions>

flow.name: io.point.APIdocShare_provider
flow.BPMNXML:
<definitions typeLanguage="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" expressionLanguage="http://www.w3.org/1999/XPath" targetNamespace="http://www.activiti.org/test" xmlns="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/MODEL" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:activiti="http://activiti.org/bpmn" xmlns:bpmndi="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/DI" xmlns:omgdc="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DC" xmlns:omgdi="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DI">
  <process id="io.point.APIdocShare_provider" name="io.point.APIdocShare_provider" isExecutable="true">
    <startEvent id="startevent1" name="Start"/>
    <serviceTask id="task1" name="List Objects" activiti:class="plugins.fact_components.api_APIdocShare_List_Objs"/>
    <serviceTask id="task2" name="List Records" activiti:class="plugins.fact_components.api_APIdocShare_List_Recs">
      <extensionElements>
        <activiti:field name="objType">
          <activiti:expression>${objTypeId}</activiti:expression>
        </activiti:field>
      </extensionElements>
    </serviceTask>
    <serviceTask id="task3" name="Read Record" activiti:class="plugins.fact_components.api_APIdocShare_Read_Obj_toFields">
      <extensionElements>
        <activiti:field name="objType">
          <activiti:expression>${objTypeId}</activiti:expression>
        </activiti:field>
        <activiti:field name="objKey">
          <activiti:expression>${objId}</activiti:expression>
        </activiti:field>
      </extensionElements>
    </serviceTask>
    <serviceTask id="task4" name="Update Record" activiti:class="plugins.fact_components.api_APIdocShare_Update_Obj_fromFields">
      <extensionElements>
        <activiti:field name="objType">
          <activiti:expression>${objTypeId}</activiti:expression>
        </activiti:field>
        <activiti:field name="objKey">
          <activiti:expression>${objId}</activiti:expression>
        </activiti:field>
      </extensionElements>
    </serviceTask>
    <sequenceFlow id="flow1" sourceRef="startevent1" targetRef="exclusivegateway1"/>
    <sequenceFlow id="flow10" sourceRef="task4" targetRef="task5"/>
    <endEvent id="endevent1" name="End"/>
    <serviceTask id="task5" name="Read Record Again" activiti:class="plugins.fact_components.api_APIdocShare_Read_Obj_toFields">
      <extensionElements>
        <activiti:field name="objType">
          <activiti:expression>${objTypeId}</activiti:expression>
        </activiti:field>
        <activiti:field name="objKey">
          <activiti:expression>${objId}</activiti:expression>
        </activiti:field>
      </extensionElements>
    </serviceTask>
    <exclusiveGateway id="exclusivegateway1" name="Exclusive Gateway" default="default"/>
    <sequenceFlow id="flow12" name="GETOBJS" sourceRef="exclusivegateway1" targetRef="task1">
      <conditionExpression xsi:type="tFormalExpression">${apidata_method == "GETOBJS"}</conditionExpression>
    </sequenceFlow>
    <sequenceFlow id="flow13" name="GETRECS" sourceRef="exclusivegateway1" targetRef="task2">
      <conditionExpression xsi:type="tFormalExpression">${apidata_method == "GETRECS"}</conditionExpression>
    </sequenceFlow>
    <sequenceFlow id="flow14" name="GET" sourceRef="exclusivegateway1" targetRef="task3">
      <conditionExpression xsi:type="tFormalExpression">${apidata_method == "GET"}</conditionExpression>
    </sequenceFlow>
    <sequenceFlow id="flow15" name="PUT" sourceRef="exclusivegateway1" targetRef="task4">
      <conditionExpression xsi:type="tFormalExpression">${apidata_method == "PUT" || apidata_method == "PATCH"}</conditionExpression>
    </sequenceFlow>
    <sequenceFlow id="flow16" sourceRef="task5" targetRef="endevent1"/>
    <sequenceFlow id="flow17" sourceRef="task3" targetRef="endevent1"/>
    <sequenceFlow id="flow18" sourceRef="task2" targetRef="endevent1"/>
    <sequenceFlow id="flow19" sourceRef="task1" targetRef="endevent1"/>
    <sequenceFlow id="default" name="Unsupported" sourceRef="exclusivegateway1" targetRef="endevent1"/>
    <userTask id="usertask1" name="Default" activiti:formKey="poi_default_view"/>
    <userTask id="usertask2" name="Shares" activiti:formKey="poi_shareslist_view"/>
    <userTask id="usertask3" name="Preview" activiti:formKey="poi_preview_view"/>
  </process>
  <bpmndi:BPMNDiagram id="BPMNDiagram_io.point.APIdocShare_provider">
    <bpmndi:BPMNPlane bpmnElement="io.point.APIdocShare_provider" id="BPMNPlane_io.point.APIdocShare_provider">
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape bpmnElement="startevent1" id="BPMNShape_startevent1">
        <omgdc:Bounds height="35.0" width="35.0" x="70.0" y="164.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape bpmnElement="task1" id="BPMNShape_task1">
        <omgdc:Bounds height="55.0" width="105.0" x="330.0" y="209.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape bpmnElement="task2" id="BPMNShape_task2">
        <omgdc:Bounds height="55.0" width="105.0" x="330.0" y="280.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape bpmnElement="task3" id="BPMNShape_task3">
        <omgdc:Bounds height="55.0" width="105.0" x="334.0" y="30.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape bpmnElement="task4" id="BPMNShape_task4">
        <omgdc:Bounds height="55.0" width="105.0" x="334.0" y="100.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape bpmnElement="endevent1" id="BPMNShape_endevent1">
        <omgdc:Bounds height="35.0" width="35.0" x="740.0" y="164.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape bpmnElement="task5" id="BPMNShape_task5">
        <omgdc:Bounds height="55.0" width="105.0" x="480.0" y="100.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape bpmnElement="exclusivegateway1" id="BPMNShape_exclusivegateway1">
        <omgdc:Bounds height="40.0" width="40.0" x="150.0" y="161.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape bpmnElement="usertask1" id="BPMNShape_usertask1">
        <omgdc:Bounds height="55.0" width="105.0" x="330.0" y="370.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape bpmnElement="usertask2" id="BPMNShape_usertask2">
        <omgdc:Bounds height="55.0" width="105.0" x="330.0" y="440.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge bpmnElement="flow1" id="BPMNEdge_flow1">
        <omgdi:waypoint x="105.0" y="181.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint x="150.0" y="181.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge bpmnElement="flow10" id="BPMNEdge_flow10">
        <omgdi:waypoint x="439.0" y="127.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint x="480.0" y="127.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge bpmnElement="flow12" id="BPMNEdge_flow12">
        <omgdi:waypoint x="170.0" y="201.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint x="169.0" y="236.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint x="330.0" y="236.0"/>
        <bpmndi:BPMNLabel>
          <omgdc:Bounds height="12.0" width="52.0" x="180.0" y="219.0"/>
        </bpmndi:BPMNLabel>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge bpmnElement="flow13" id="BPMNEdge_flow13">
        <omgdi:waypoint x="170.0" y="201.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint x="169.0" y="307.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint x="330.0" y="307.0"/>
        <bpmndi:BPMNLabel>
          <omgdc:Bounds height="12.0" width="53.0" x="180.0" y="289.0"/>
        </bpmndi:BPMNLabel>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge bpmnElement="flow14" id="BPMNEdge_flow14">
        <omgdi:waypoint x="170.0" y="161.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint x="170.0" y="57.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint x="334.0" y="57.0"/>
        <bpmndi:BPMNLabel>
          <omgdc:Bounds height="12.0" width="23.0" x="179.0" y="41.0"/>
        </bpmndi:BPMNLabel>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge bpmnElement="flow15" id="BPMNEdge_flow15">
        <omgdi:waypoint x="170.0" y="161.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint x="170.0" y="127.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint x="334.0" y="127.0"/>
        <bpmndi:BPMNLabel>
          <omgdc:Bounds height="12.0" width="22.0" x="179.0" y="111.0"/>
        </bpmndi:BPMNLabel>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge bpmnElement="flow16" id="BPMNEdge_flow16">
        <omgdi:waypoint x="585.0" y="127.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint x="757.0" y="127.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint x="757.0" y="164.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge bpmnElement="flow17" id="BPMNEdge_flow17">
        <omgdi:waypoint x="439.0" y="57.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint x="757.0" y="57.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint x="757.0" y="164.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge bpmnElement="flow18" id="BPMNEdge_flow18">
        <omgdi:waypoint x="435.0" y="307.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint x="757.0" y="307.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint x="757.0" y="199.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge bpmnElement="flow19" id="BPMNEdge_flow19">
        <omgdi:waypoint x="435.0" y="236.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint x="757.0" y="236.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint x="757.0" y="199.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge bpmnElement="default" id="BPMNEdge_default">
        <omgdi:waypoint x="190.0" y="181.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint x="740.0" y="181.0"/>
        <bpmndi:BPMNLabel>
          <omgdc:Bounds height="12.0" width="100.0" x="209.0" y="164.0"/>
        </bpmndi:BPMNLabel>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
    </bpmndi:BPMNPlane>
  </bpmndi:BPMNDiagram>
</definitions>
